p: An inverse correlation was observed between body weight and relative liver weight. Relative liver weight enhanced from 2.35 % in control to 4.31 % in DCF treated rats (p < 0.0001) while treatment with EA and Tb fruit extracts (AQ and Eth) showed a restorative effect on the liver weight of rats. In comparison to Group II rats, the recovery with the administration of EA and Tb fruit extracts was statistically significant (p < 0.005).
